7640dddf-f7de-452c-a8d1-e43cb0c2f081.name: MDR-ZX310AP Wired On-ear Folding Headphones | Black
features: Smartphone playback control1: Smartphone playback control1The integrated microphone and multi-function control1 button make the the MDR-ZX310AP the perfect companion for your smartphone. Android™ users can also enjoy the convenient Smart Key app for added control functionality directly from your smartphone.

Quality Sound: Quality SoundThe large 30mm driver units coupled with ferrite magnets will accurately reproduce a broad, dynamic frequency range. You'll enjoy smooth transitions in treble and mid-range frequencies with powerful bass response.
Pressure Relieving Earpads: Pressure Relieving EarpadsThe lightweight, adjustable headband with swivel ear pads is designed for comfort so you can enjoy extended listening sessions without fatigue.
Swivel Earcups: Swivel EarcupsThe slim, swivel and folding style earcups stow away for compact portability.
Y-Type cord: Y-Type cordThe traditional Y-type cord design helps reduce the chance of tangles while the 4-conductor gold plated, L-shaped plug ensures a good connection.
